attributes.action: I would like you to introduce flexiweek School holiday for parents and teachers.
attributes.additional_details:
Good education is important but so is  happy childhood memories family time. Teachers should have a right to at least one week of their choice, this may help in recruitment.
 The population is about 69 million now, in 2050 the uk population is est to be 78m. We cannot continue cramming parents and teachers into a quarter of a year for holidays.
Some people cannot get time off during school holidays. 
People holidaying different times during the year would be good for seaside towns in th UK.
attributes.background:
Take one of the school holiday weeks and make a flexiweek for parents/ teachers. This would help parents, teachers and the economy.
Ipads would be used so children can home study. This method can be used for a child who has been ill. It's a good way to teach a child to study themselves.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We don't know when you'd like the flexi-week to be. We're not sure if this would be an additional week of school during the year.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
